channel.title: CVE Feed for Realtek -- USB FE/1GbE/2.5GbE/5GbE NIC Family
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Realtek -- USB FE/1GbE/2.5GbE/5GbE NIC Family

item.title: CVE-2022-21742|2024-08-03T02:53:36.255Z -- realtek -- usb%20fe%2F1gbe%2F2.5gbe%2F5gbe%20nic%20family
item.description: Realtek USB driver has a buffer overflow vulnerability due to insufficient parameter length verification in the API function. An unauthenticated LAN attacker can exploit this vulnerability to disrupt services.
